title: Darius
body:
Basically just had a match as Darius and decided to jump onto the board and leave something here for perhaps a community/supportish tech to perhaps see. Basically since the rework, hes worked fairly well. I don't have any complaints about his passive, or his w, e and r. However I can't help but feel that the heal on his Q is a bit in the op zone. The current amount is just crazy, especially on an ability that has a relatively low cd and is incredibly easy to hit with.

The heal itself on that ability is fine, but the amount does need to be dropped. I suggest halving it from what it currently is. We can then see how it goes from there.
